abilityList.name: S1:Brilliant Intent
abilityList.effect:
Boosts damage by 3% while PP
at is 40% or above.

abilityList.name: S1:Double-Edged Sword
abilityList.effect:
Deal 4% more damage but take
8% more damage.

abilityList.name: S1:Immediate Intent
abilityList.effect:
Successive Just Attacks will
increase damage up to 3%.

abilityList.name: S1:Blue Ocean Flash
abilityList.effect:
Recover 4% HP every second for 30
seconds after taking 600 damage.

abilityList.name: S1:White Snow Flash
abilityList.effect:
+20% PP Recovery on attacks for 30
seconds after using 150 PP.

abilityList.name: S1:Yellow Moon Flash
abilityList.effect:
8% PP Consumption Reduction for 20
seconds upon Just Guarding.

abilityList.name: S1:Green Leaf Flash
abilityList.effect:
Every 20 seconds, a barrier will
turn on/off. The barrier reduces
damage by 8% and prevents flinching.

abilityList.name: S1:Black Shadow Flash
abilityList.effect:
Increase Natural PP Recovery for 20
seconds after standing still
for 5 seconds.

abilityList.name: S1:Brilliant Ruin
abilityList.effect:
Recovery PP upon enemies
being defeated near you.

abilityList.name: S1:Powering Intent
abilityList.effect: Increase damage dealt to bosses by 4%.

abilityList.name: S1:Rupturing Excess
abilityList.effect:
Increase PP recovery rate by 40%
when attacking breakable parts.

abilityList.name: S1:Phantasmal Intent
abilityList.effect:
Boosts damage based
on the Photon Blast
gauge.

abilityList.name: S1:Sturdy Intent
abilityList.effect:
Increase damage by 4%
if your weapon's element
or equipped Guard Ring
match the enemy's elemental weakness.

abilityList.name: S1:Violent Invigoration
abilityList.effect:
Increase damage and PP recovery.
Reduce PP consumption.
Effect resets when damage is taken.

abilityList.name: S1:Phanatical Advantage
abilityList.effect:
Increase power by 5% and
reduce damage taken by 12% in the
Quest Solo Training: Phanatical Phantoms.

abilityList.name: S1:Brilliant Ruin 2
abilityList.effect:
Recover PP when an enemy
near you is defeated. (+4 PP)

abilityList.name: S1:Lethal Intent
abilityList.effect:
Reduce HP by 5% every 20 seconds
and increase Power by 4%.

abilityList.name: S1:Flowing Intent
abilityList.effect:
Increase power every second.
Maxes at 4% (30s to MAX).

abilityList.name: S1:Strike Boost
abilityList.effect:
Increase Power by 1% for every 60 S-ATK
of special abilities
added to this weapon to the item,
and boosts by a further 2% if 200+

abilityList.name: S1:Shoot Boost
abilityList.effect:
Increase Power by 1% for every 60 R-ATK
of special abilities
added to this weapon to the item,
and boosts by a further 2% if 200+

abilityList.name: S1:Tech Boost
abilityList.effect:
Increase Power by 1% for every 60 T-ATK
of special abilities
added to this weapon to the item,
and boosts by a further 2% if 200+

abilityList.name: S1:Reckless Strike
abilityList.effect:
Boosts power each
time you take damage,
up to three levels. If
you take damage at
maximum boost,
damages everything
around you and
reduces your HP to 1.

abilityList.name: S1:Augment Intent
abilityList.effect:
Boosts power for each
special ability added
to the item. Maximum
boost: 4%.

abilityList.name: S1:Eclipsing Decay
abilityList.effect:
Grant a 25% chance to inflict
the Jellen status when attacking an enemy.

abilityList.name: S1:Photon Balance
abilityList.effect:
Increases PP
consumption by 8%,
but boosts PA and
Tech damage by 4%.

abilityList.name: S1:Collaborator Liberator
abilityList.effect:
Reduces PP consumption,
boosts critical rate and
boosts power based on
the number of people in
your party (min. 2).

abilityList.name: S1:Immediate Skill
abilityList.effect:
When you Just Guard
at less than 25% HP,
recovers HP by 50%
and PP by 30%

abilityList.name: S2:Sturdy Recovery
abilityList.effect:
Gives a fixed chance of
restoring HP equal to 1%
of damage dealt. (Max: 300)

abilityList.name: S2:Cursed Radiance
abilityList.effect: Recovers PP by 15% when taking damage.

abilityList.name: S2:Immediate Profusion
abilityList.effect:
Raises damage by 3% when Just
Attacking different PAs or
Techniques.

abilityList.name: S2:Nature's Skill
abilityList.effect:
Increase Critical Hit Rate by 20%
when S1:Red Petal Flash, S1:Blue
Ocean Flash, or S1:White Snow Flash are active.

abilityList.name: S2:Nature's Intent
abilityList.effect:
Increase damage by 3% when S1:Red
Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash,
or S1:White Snow Flash are active.

abilityList.name: S2:Nature's Exhilaration
abilityList.effect:
Recover 2% HP every second when S1:Red
Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash,
or S1:White Snow Flash are active.

abilityList.name: S2:Nature's Reduction
abilityList.effect:
Decrease PP consumption by 12% when S1:Red
Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash,
or S1:White Snow Flash are active.

abilityList.name: S2:Umbrageous Gleam
abilityList.effect:
Increase Natural PP Recovery by 25% when S1:Yellow
Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash,
or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.

abilityList.name: S2:Umbrageous Guardian
abilityList.effect:
Decrease damage taken by 12% when S1:Yellow
Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash,
or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.

abilityList.name: S2:Brilliant Ruin
abilityList.effect:
Recover PP when an enemy near you
is defeated.

abilityList.name: S2:Rupturing Intent
abilityList.effect: Increase damage against breakable parts by 3%.

abilityList.name: S2:Rupturing Excess
abilityList.effect:
Increase PP recovery rate by 35%
when attacking breakable parts.

abilityList.name: S2:Double-Edged Sword
abilityList.effect:
Increase Power by 3%
but take 6% more damage
when weapon is drawn.

abilityList.name: S2:Powering Intent
abilityList.effect: Increase damage dealt to bosses by 3%.

abilityList.name: S2:Phantasmal Radiance
abilityList.effect:
Increase Active PP Recovery based
on the Photon Blast Gauge.

abilityList.name: S2:Phantasmal Gleam
abilityList.effect:
Increase Natural PP Recovery based
on the Photon Blast Gauge.

abilityList.name: S2:Phantasmal Guardian
abilityList.effect:
Reduce damage taken based
on the Photon Blast Guage.

abilityList.name: S2:Phanatical Advantage
abilityList.effect:
Increase power by 5%
and reduce damage taken by 12%
in the Quest Solo Training: Phanatical Phantoms.

abilityList.name: S2:Violent Invigoration
abilityList.effect:
Increase damage and PP recovery.
Reduce PP consumption.
Effect resets when damage is taken.

abilityList.name: S2:Umbrageous Melody
abilityList.effect:
Increase power over time when
S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash,
or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.
Maxes at 5%

abilityList.name: S2:Nature's Reduction 2
abilityList.effect:
Reduce PP consumption by 14%
when S1:Red Petal Flash,
S1:Blue Ocean Flash,
or S1:White Snow Flash are active.

abilityList.name: S2:Umbrageous Radiance 2
abilityList.effect:
Increase Active PP Recovery by 28%
when S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash,
or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.

abilityList.name: S2:Medicinal Wisdom
abilityList.effect:
Boost PP recovery when a -mate item is used.
Effects varies per mate.

abilityList.name: S2:Umbrageous Radiance
abilityList.effect:
Increase Active PP Recovery by 25%
when S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash,
or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.

abilityList.name: S2:Instant Reduction
abilityList.effect:
Reduces PP consumption by 12% when Just
Attacking different PAs or Techniques.

abilityList.name: S2:Runner's High
abilityList.effect:
Increase Natural PP Recovery by 100%
and restore 15% HP every 5 seconds when running.

abilityList.name: S2:Flaming Guard
abilityList.effect:
Increases your Fire
attribute and Burn
resistance. Boosts
power against enemies
that are weak to Fire.

abilityList.name: S2:Freezing Guard
abilityList.effect:
Increases your Ice
attribute and Freeze
resistance. Boosts
power against enemies
that are weak to Ice.

abilityList.name: S2:Lightning Guard
abilityList.effect:
Increases your Lightning
attribute and Shock
resistance. Boosts
power against enemies
that are weak to Lightning.

abilityList.name: S2:Skill Reduction
abilityList.effect:
Reduces PP consumption
by 5% for 30 seconds
after hitting with a PA
or Tech. Occasionally
reduces consumption
by 30%. Has a cooldown.

abilityList.name: S2:Storm Guard
abilityList.effect:
Increases your Wind
attribute and Shock
resistance. Boosts
power against enemies
that are weak to Wind.

abilityList.name: S2:Aegis Gift
abilityList.effect:
When you Just Guard
at less than 25% HP,
recovers HP by 50%
and PP by 30%.

abilityList.name: S2:Heavenly Keeper
abilityList.effect:
In the air, reduces PP
consumption by 8%.
On the ground, boosts
PP regeneration and
attack PP recovery
by 20%.

abilityList.name: S2:Shining Guard
abilityList.effect:
Increases your Light
attribute and Panic
resistance. Boosts
power against enemies
that are weak to Light.

abilityList.name: S2:Darkness Guard
abilityList.effect:
Increases your Dark
attribute and Poison
resistance. Boosts
power against enemies
that are weak to Dark.

abilityList.name: S2:Flowing Exhilaration 2
abilityList.effect: Recover 75% of your maximum HP at regular intervals.

abilityList.name: S2:Rainbow's Intent
abilityList.effect:
While Petal, Ocean,
Leaf, Moon, Snow or
Shadow Flash is active:
Boosts damage by 5%.

abilityList.name: S2:Rainbow's Exhilaration

Shadow Flash is active:
Recovers 3% of your
HP every second.

Boosts damage by up
to 7% over time.

abilityList.effect:
Boosts damage by 3%
while PP is at 40%

abilityList.effect:
Recovers 70 HP when

abilityList.name: S3:Fortifying Strike
abilityList.effect:
Decrease damage taken by 1% for
every 300,000 damage dealt. Maxes at 15%.

abilityList.name: S3:Curtailed Strike
abilityList.effect:
Decrease PP consumption by 1% for
every 300,000 damage dealt. Maxes at 15%.

abilityList.name: S3:Wise Strike
abilityList.effect:
Increase Critical Hit Rate by 2% for
every 300,000 damage dealt. Maxes at 30%.

abilityList.name: S3:Double-Edged Sword
abilityList.effect: Deal 4% more damage but take 8% more damage when weapon is drawn.

abilityList.name: S3:Furious Inspiration
abilityList.effect:
Boosts power and
critical hit rate.
Improves PP efficiency.
This effect disappears
on taking damage, then
is restored after a set
time.

abilityList.effect:
Boosts attack PP
recovery by 35% when
attacking breakable

abilityList.name: S3:Nature's Melody 2
abilityList.effect:
While Red Petal Flash,
Blue Ocean Flash or

While Petal, Ocean,
Leaf, Moon, Snow or
Shadow Flash is active:
Boosts PP regeneration
by 40%.

abilityList.name: S3:Immediate Brilliance
abilityList.effect:
Successful JA hits
boosts your PP
recovery amount by
3%. Cannot exceed
30%. Non-JA hits
are excluded.

abilityList.name: S3:Puncturing Intent
abilityList.effect:
Upon landing a
Critical Hit on a
breakable part,
your power is
boosted by 9%.

abilityList.name: S4:Marvelous Aegis
abilityList.effect: Restores PP on a successful Just Guard.

abilityList.name: S4:Steel Resolve
abilityList.effect: Survive one fatal hit with 1 HP remaining.

abilityList.name: S4:Radiant Response
abilityList.effect: Raises PP efficiency based on maximum PP.

abilityList.name: S4:Opposing Skill
abilityList.effect:
During Brave Stance, frontal critical
rate is raised by 30%.

abilityList.name: S4:Cunning Strike
abilityList.effect: During Wise Stance, boosts frontal damage by 15%.

abilityList.name: S4:Vampiric Strike
abilityList.effect:
Restores HP equal to 1% of damage dealt.
(Max: 30)

abilityList.name: S4:Steadfast Courage
abilityList.effect:
Become immune to knockback by standing still
for a certain time.

abilityList.name: S4:Lustrous Trap
abilityList.effect:
Increases PP recovery from Tactics Trap by
20%.

abilityList.name: S4:Dynamic Chain
abilityList.effect:
Become invincible for 5 seconds when activating
Chain Trigger.

abilityList.name: S4:Circuit Rotation
abilityList.effect: Reduces recast time of Photon Flare by 20%.

abilityList.name: S4:Gear Reduction
abilityList.effect:
Decreases rate that Gear gauge empties while
Katana Gear is active.

abilityList.name: S4:Rapid-fire Arrow
abilityList.effect:
Bullet Bow damage is boosted by 3% during
Rapid Shot.

abilityList.name: S4:Support Extension
abilityList.effect:
Extends the effect of Shifta and Deband to
last 120 seconds.

abilityList.name: S4:Genesis Ring
abilityList.effect:
Changes the weapon's element to match an equipped
Guard ring.

abilityList.name: S4:Heavenly Protection
abilityList.effect:
Bestow Natural PP Recovery and
increase PP recovery rate while Guarding.

abilityList.name: S4:Calming Intent
abilityList.effect:
Increase the power of
Normal Attacks by 13%.

abilityList.name: S4:Skilled Balance
abilityList.effect:
Reduce Critical Hit Rate by 50% and
increase the power of Critical Hits by 6%.

abilityList.name: S4:Saint Shield
abilityList.effect:
Generates a barrier (-50% Damage Taken,
Negate Knockback) at regular intervals

abilityList.name: S4:Harmonized Rainbow
abilityList.effect:
Decrease Natural PP Recovery but decrease
PP consumption when S1:Red Petal Flash,
S1:Blue Ocean Flash, S1:White Snow Flash,
S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash,
or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.

abilityList.name: S4:Raising Pursuit
abilityList.effect:
When you hit with a
PA/Tech, boosts damage
of the next PA/Tech
based on the damage you
deal in the next 4 seconds.

abilityList.name: S4:Pursuing Eclipse
abilityList.effect:
Boosts critical hit rate
by 50% against enemies
affected by Jellen,
Weak Bullet or a status
effect.

abilityList.name: S4:Cursed Rainbow
abilityList.effect:
While Petal, Ocean,
Leaf, Moon, Snow or
Shadow Flash is active:
Recovers 500 HP each
time you take 500 or
more damage at once.

abilityList.name: S4:Evasion Training
abilityList.effect:
Evading when the two
circles overlap puts
you in a "Successful
Evasion" state. If you
do not evade, recovers
5% of maximum HP.

abilityList.name: S4:Colossal Radiance
abilityList.effect:
Recovers 40 PP every
10 seconds when there
is a boss nearby.

abilityList.name: S4:Radiant Eclipse
abilityList.effect:
Boosts attack PP
recovery by 60% when
attacking an enemy
affected by status,
Jellen or Weak Bullet.

abilityList.name: S4:Shared Ruin
abilityList.effect:
You and your party
recover HP and PP
when an enemy dies
within range.

abilityList.name: S5:Release Parry
abilityList.effect:
Performance alters
after a Just Guard
using the Weapon
Action. Sword only.

abilityList.name: S5:Unrivaled Parry
abilityList.effect:
After a Just Guard,
Gear consumption
reduced to 0 for 15
seconds. Boosts damage
by 2%. Wired Lance only.

abilityList.name: S5:Rushing Bolt
abilityList.effect:
Damages enemies when
you touch them while
running at high speed.
When you stop running,
generates a shockwave.
Boosts damage by 2%.
Partizan only.

abilityList.name: S5:Shining Cyclone
abilityList.effect:
PP consumption and PP
recovery sped change
when below 50% PP.
Twin Daggers only.

abilityList.name: S5:Evasive Barrage
abilityList.effect:
Fills Gear Gauge and
hits enemies with a
powerful blow on a
successful DS Wind
Parry. Boosts damage
by 2%. Double Saber
only.

abilityList.name: S5:Evasive Meteor
abilityList.effect:
Drops a giant fist on the
target after avoiding an
attack with Sway.
Boosts damage by 2%.
Knuckles only.

abilityList.name: S5:Hangeki Edge
abilityList.effect:
Boosts Counter power.
A successful Braver
counter fills Gear to
maximum. Katana only.

abilityList.name: S5:Thundering Pursuit
abilityList.effect:
When using a PA,
lightning bolts are
formed from Photons.
Dual Blades only.

abilityList.name: S5:Fiery End
abilityList.effect:
Boosts End Attract.
Has a cooldown after
using End Attract.
Cooldown time is
shortened when you
avoid an attack with
Dive Roll. Boosts
damage by 2%.
Assault Rifle only.

abilityList.name: S5:Fiery Zero
abilityList.effect:
Boosts Zero Distance.
Has a cooldown after
using Zero Distance.
Cooldown time is
shortened when you
avoid an attack with
Dive Roll. Boosts
damage by 2%.
Launcher only.

abilityList.name: S5:Bright Escape
abilityList.effect:
Grants a PP recovery
effect when you
evade an attack with
Step or Stylish Roll,
until you take damage.
Twin Machineguns only.

abilityList.name: S5:Auxiliary Arrow
abilityList.effect:
Creates a Chase
Arrow each time you
hit with a PA other than
Banishing Arrow.
Boosts these Chase
Arrows for a short
time each time you
avoid an attack with
Step.

abilityList.name: S5:Calming Bullet
abilityList.effect:
Enhances normal
attacks and boosts the
power of Rod Shoot by
100%. Rod only.

abilityList.name: S5:Speedy Support
abilityList.effect:
Reduces the charge
time of support Techs.
Reduces the power of
Zondeel. Talis only.

abilityList.name: S5:Calming Shockwave
abilityList.effect:
Unleashes a shockwave
on your third step
normal attack. Boosts
damage by 2%. Wand
only.

abilityList.name: S5:Rhythmic Pursuer
abilityList.effect:
Boosts the power of
Elemental Burst by 30%
and activates it
automatically during PA
Shift Actions. Jet Boots
only.

abilityList.name: S5:Mysterious Purpose
abilityList.effect:
Boosts critical hit rate
by 20%. On a critical
hit, boosts damage by
2% and recovers 1%
of damage dealt as HP.
(Max. recovery: 30 HP)

abilityList.name: S5:Instant Invocation
abilityList.effect:
Technique damage is
decreased by 40%, but
using the same
Technique with a JA
substantially
decreases charge
time.

abilityList.name: S5:Vigorous Response
abilityList.effect:
Grants a bonus when
your max HP is at
1000. Gain additional
bonuses per 500 max
HP over. Maximum
bonuses are reached
when max HP is at
3000.

abilityList.name: S5:Tethered Eclipse
abilityList.effect:
Boosts damage by 3%
against enemies
inflicted with a
status effect. Also
gives a chance to
inflict Bind by 40%.

abilityList.name: S5:Angelic Respite
abilityList.effect:
At maximum Gear, you
consume no Gear while
in the air. Partizan only.

abilityList.name: S5:Chained Radiance
abilityList.effect:
Recovers PP and boosts
damage by 3% for 60
seconds after activating
Chain Trigger.
Twin Machineguns only.

abilityList.name: S5:Calming Quartet
abilityList.effect:
Reduces the power of
normal attacks by 67%,
but makes each normal
attack fire 4 shots.
Launchers only.

abilityList.name: S5:Calming Expanse
abilityList.effect:
Adds an extra wide-area
attack and a chance to
stun to normal attacks.
Assault Rifles only.

abilityList.name: S5:Area Support
abilityList.effect:
Gain additional bonus
effects to Critical
Field and EPPR when
either are active.

abilityList.name: S5:Swift Radiance
abilityList.effect:
Reduces PP regeneration
to 0. Boosts attack PP
recovery by 50% and
recovers 100 PP on a
successful dodge.

abilityList.name: S6:Heroic Howl
abilityList.effect:
Enhances Hero Boost.
Increases the rate that
Hero Boosts's damage
boost increases. No
effect if using weapon
with "Heroic Victory".

abilityList.name: S6:Soaring Ballet
abilityList.effect:
Bouncer weapon Gear
fills while standing still.
No effect if using
weapon with "Angelic
Guidance".

abilityList.name: S6:Guardian's Essence
abilityList.effect:
Hunter weapon and
Katana Gear fills while
Guarding. No effect if
using weapon with
"Zephyr's Edge".

abilityList.name: S6:Ironclad Illness
abilityList.effect:
Become massive for 60
seconds after becoming
affected by a status
effect.

abilityList.name: S6:Brilliant Ruin
abilityList.effect:
When an enemy is
defeated within a
certain range,
recovers 5 PP.

abilityList.name: S6:Readying Guard
abilityList.effect:
Gain a 10% chance to
reduce damage by
70%.

abilityList.name: S6:Evasion Whistle
abilityList.effect:
Dodging will cause
your pet to return
back to you.

abilityList.name: S6:Battle Readiness
abilityList.effect:
When your HP is at 50%
or lower, damage is
reduced by 40%.
Resets after a
brief cooldown.

abilityList.name: S6:Long Night Star
abilityList.effect:
Reduces Etoile Boost's
decay per second by
50%.

abilityList.name: S6:Overlimit
abilityList.effect:
Boosts maximum HP by
50% while Limit Break
is active.

abilityList.name: S6:Wondrous Encore
abilityList.effect:
Reduces Showtime's
hate increase. Once per
activation, reduces
damage taken and
maintains One More Time.

abilityList.effect:

second when standing
still for longer than 1
second.

abilityList.effect:

to stun the enemy
with a Just Attack.

abilityList.effect:

with "Glance of

abilityList.effect:

abilityList.effect:

& reduces damage

15%.

invincible after drinking
a -mate item.

abilityList.name: S8:High-Minded
abilityList.effect:

while charging a
Technique in the air.
